body.name: WiFi Hidden Spy Camera Mini Wirelss Home Security Indoor Camera, Phone APP Live View, Motion Detection, Night Vision, 1080P HD
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 17 mins
features: SUPER MINI & PORTABLE: This tiny camera is 2023 smallest camera (1.1 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches) and only works with 2.4GHz WiFi, which makes it perfect to keep an eye on your babies, lover and property. You can put this camera at the corners of rooms, walls, office, store, even on your clothes pocket or backpack.

1080P HD & 90° WIDE ANGEL: This mini wireless camera uses an advanced 2.0MP image sensor that can capture 1920 x 1080P HD live videos at 25fps with accurate color reproduction. 90° wide angle len ensures to catch more details.

MOTION DETECTION & REMOTE VIEW: Once the cam detects any movement, it will push alarms with images on your phone. You can log into phone app to see what’s happening in real time video, and never worry about missing anything important. You can also manually set the sensor sensitivity (Low/ Medium/ High) to prevent false alarms.

NIGHT VISION & 3M RANGE: This covert camera will never miss a beat with professional-grade night vision that leaves nothing to the imagination. It has 6 invisible and non-luminous infrared lights that can deliver outstanding night view range up to 9.8ft(3m) , and you can also manually turn Night Vision on or off.

24/7 RECORDING & LOOP RECORD:Built-in 500mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery, MSDS and UN38.3 certified. Besides, you can charge it with the included charging cable to keep it recording 7/24. It requires Micro SD card (up to 32G, not included) to save and playback the recording files.Loop record function allows the card to auto overwrite the oldest files while the card memory is full.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Under such challenging times in which security has been a great issue for everyone in our daily life, it matters to protect our privacy whether at home or on business. BZZCAM works for modern life, for convenient, comfortable, reasonable, relaxed and safe pace. Since 2018, BZZCAM Mini Camera series starts to launch in the United States, Europe and Japan. BZZCAM offers a broad range of security camera options to ensure that you have what you need to accomplish your surveillance goals. Whether you're looking for a battery-powered Wi-Fi camera that operates effectively on-the-go, a body-worn camera that captures covert surveillance while disguised on your person, or a remote-view camera that can be monitored from an alternate location via a smartphone, we have got your needs covered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just love these cameras. Small and simple to use you can put one just about anywhere you want. I keep an eye on my dog when I am away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not So Great Camera
reviews.reviewText: I was disappointed this small camera was not better. It was a bit clunky to connect to my iPhone 14 via the app the first time, then inexplicably disconnected - took me a while to reconnect it and I am not confident in the procedure. It attaches magnetically to a stand, and the stand to a surface via adhesive. This defeated the purpose I had in mind to be able to move it easily from room to room as needed.The video quality is OK - I have a hard time seeing this as 1080P resolution.Overall, the connection issues were the biggest issue from me and quite a headache.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best camera you can get...
reviews.reviewText: Let me first start by saying the small size is what is so appealing... easy to hide. Downsides... there are plenty first of all being it isn't the most friendly camera to set up and connect to wifi. If you work through it and you are patient... you can get it connected. Video quality isn't the best, but not terrible given the size of camera. The mounting stand has adhesive so it isn't easily moved... I fixed that problem by attaching a velcro pad to the bottom. Does it work... technically yes. Is it great? Not that great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Wi-Fi mini camera with 2K resolution. The fact that it's small, compact, and easy to use are definitely positives. When it comes to cameras like these, the convenience of size can be a big plus, especially if you need to place it in tight spaces or prefer something discreet. The 2K quality, while not the highest available, should still provide decent clarity for most everyday needs. It's always a balance between resolution, size, and ease of use, and it seems this camera strikes a good balance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars SKIP THIS ONE
reviews.reviewText: I spent far too much time just trying to connect & set this up.A process that should take perhaps 2 minutes, over 30 minutes later still may as well be unopened.Save your money, save your time & frustration - do NOT get this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like how it pretty much functions like a normal security camera with all the features but it's so tiny. I can put it anywhere and hide it much easier than a larger camera. The battery last a long time too. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Frustrating wifi cam
reviews.reviewText: If this camera connected to the app and worked reliably then I would say it's pretty cool. But when it did connect it took forever and the video was very choppy.I do like the size and compactness of the camera. Also love that it's magnetic. Has potential but the app connections tanks its

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small form factor wifi camera
reviews.reviewText: Review for: "WiFi Camera Mini Wirelss Home Security Indoor Camera, Phone APP Live View, Motion Detection, Night Vision, 1080P HD (Fashion Black)"I really like the form factor, which is tiny little camera. But it is below average performance for my use application. The included micro usb charging port is a nice feature. And it can be used while charging, The built in battery live is short that understandable because of the small form factor. It only accept 32Gb micro SD max which is pretty small by today standard.The deal breaker for me is, it is very laggy, not responsive. Maybe due to slow processor. And the image quality is not so good. In contrast lighting, the shadow have no details. In proper lighting the image is okay. Even I choose 1080 resolution, I don't see it as sharp as average camera. If they put a better sensor, it will be a perfect miniature camera.For baby monitor in a proper lighting it is usable, but not for my use case.
